desc: A study of Norwegian literature from the Saga period through Ibsen, this chronological overview examines literary developments in the context of historical, cultural, and linguistic change and relates Norwegian literature to international trends. Lectures, essays,and class discussion are in Norwegian. Offered annually in the fall semester. Prerequisite: NORW 253 or equivalent.
name: Norsk Lit Til 1890
notes: This course is a special offering.
title: Norwegian Literature from the Saga Period to 1890
